title: 11/24/2020 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 11/24/2020 - Best of The Herd
description:
-Bruce Arians got outcoached by Sean McVay

-The Rams and Saints are the top two teams in the NFC

-The Bucs are like a TV show that needs a 2nd season to get things right

-Herd Hierarchy: Colin's top ten teams in the NFL

-Kevin Stefanski has done a masterful job with the Browns

-Thanksgiving dish QB comparisons


Guest: Nick Wright, FS1's First Things First

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
